channel.title: Ecological Forecasting
channel.itunes:subtitle: Forecasts about Ticks
channel.itunes:author: Ecocast Forecasting
channel.itunes:summary: Ecological Forcasts for tick, jelly fish and other species encounters
channel.description: Weekly updates about Tick and Jelly Fish Forcasts

item.title: Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Ecocast Team
item.itunes:subtitle: The Weekend Update July 14, 2017
item.itunes:summary: <greeting>We discuss deer tick encounter risk in the Northeast. We are waiting for user reports of Jelly Fish to generate better forecasts.</greeting>

channel.title: Episode 5
channel.itunes:author: Ecocast Team
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekend Update July 07, 2017
channel.itunes:summary: <greeting>Our tick forecast is down this week, so we will take a look at the Jelly Fish forecast. Remember to enter Jelly Fish sitings at https://jellyfish.bigelow.org/jellyfish/</greeting>
channel.title: Episode 4
channel.itunes:author: Ecocast Team
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekend Update June 30, 2017
channel.itunes:summary: <greeting>We discuss the encounter risk for three different species of Jelly Fish </greeting>
channel.title: Episode 3
channel.itunes:author: Ecocast Team
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekend Update June 23, 2017
channel.itunes:summary: <greeting>We discuss a Jelly Fish bloom in Casco Bay. </greeting>
channel.title: Episode 2
channel.itunes:author: Ecocast Team
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Weekend Update June 09, 2017
channel.itunes:summary: <greeting>We discuss the deer tick forecast for the Northeast. Remember to record tick sitings at https://report.bigelow.org/tick/ .</greeting>

channel.itunes:summary: <greeting>We discuss deer tick encounter risk in the Northeast. Remember to record tick sitings at https://report.bigelow.org/tick/ .</greeting>
